meaningMnemonic: The <radical>toe</radical> is <radical>early</radical>. I hate it when the toes show up early. Well, if the toes are going to show up this early, I guess it's best to put them on the <kanji>table</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: What do all the early toes on the <kanji>table</kanji> do while they're waiting until it's the right time? They just sit around on their table, <reading>talk</reading>ing (たく).
